page.title: 04CUSTOMS OLD AND NEW
page.content: Every year Burley Village Show is held in the village school with Bric-a-Brac stalls,White Elephant stalls,and many others.Pony rides and teas are there. There is another Fete in the summer. Country dancing is performed,all the same things are sold.There used to be Maypole dancing but it ended in 1860. At Burley School every 3 weeks a Car Boot Sale is held,people sell many things in their car boots.It costs 3 pounds to enter a car,tourists are free.The people who enter cars make a lot of money.Jumble sales happen but not at set times.Clothes and old things are sold.Every year the school holds a Jumble sale and a School Clothes sale.The sale of clothes consists of school uniforms,summer and winter. By Jenice Mortimer
